var.description: Array of the default options that apply to this renderer.

description.compact: Render and return an array structure suitable for generating HTML based differences. Generally called by subclasses that generate a HTML based diff and return an array of the changes to show in the diff.

return.description: An array of the generated chances, suitable for presentation in HTML.

comment.value: As we'll be modifying a & b to include our change markers,
we need to get the contents and store them here. That way
we're not going to destroy the original data

description.compact: Given two strings, determine where the changes in the two strings begin, and where the changes in the two strings end.

return.description: Array containing the starting position (0 by default) and the ending position (-1 by default)

description.compact: Format a series of lines suitable for output in a HTML rendered diff.

docblock.description: This involves replacing tab characters with spaces, making the HTML safe for output, ensuring that double spaces are replaced with   etc.

description.compact: Replace a string containing spaces with a HTML representation using  .

return.description: The HTML representation of the string.

description.compact: Replace tabs in a single line with a number of spaces as defined by the tabSize option.

return.description: The line with the tabs converted to spaces.

description.compact: Make a string containing HTML safe for output on a page.

return.description: The string with the HTML characters replaced by entities.
